sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A plaine and familiar exposition of the thirteenth and fourteenth chapters of the Prouerbs of Salomon Dod, John, 1549?-1645. Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625.
[4], 152 [i.e. 154], [1] p.
By R.B. for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet, neare the Conduit, Imprinted at London : 1608.
Dedication signed: Iohn Dod, Robert Cleauer. Signatures: A-V⁴. Marginal notes. Errors in paging: p. 90 misnumbered 60, p. 115 repeated in the numbering. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======

By R.B. for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet, neare the Conduit, Imprinted at London : 1608.
